author: Staff Writer - Unlimited Digital Access
title: NFL player props: 5 best bets for Wild Card Weekend
text: NFL player props: 5 best bets for Wild Card Weekend After fighting all season to get to the playoffs, weather could be the most dominant factor in 2 of the games and will have an impact on a couple of this week's Wild Card Weekend. Below, we analyze [BetMGM Sportsbook's](https://mediaserver.betmgmpartners.com/renderBanner.do?zoneId=1702752) NFL odds and lines, and tab the best NFL Wild Card Weekend player prop bets to cash in on among SportbookWire's [NFL expert picks and predictions](https://sportsbookwire.usatoday.com/category/nfl-odds-lines-spreads-picks-predictions/). For this week's picks, we have a running back going Over his projection in the freezing conditionals in Kansas City, a QB rushing for a TD in the snow in Buffalo, 2 running backs not hitting their numbers in climate-controlled conditions and one of the most dynamic wide receivers dominating his matchup. FOOTBALL NEVER STOPS Live games, analysis and more 7 days a week: [Get ESPN+](https://go.web.plus.espn.com/GjNV9m) NFL Wild Card Weekend prop bet picks and predictions Odds provided by [BetMGM Sportsbook](https://mediaserver.betmgmpartners.com/renderBanner.do?zoneId=1702752); access [USA TODAY Sports Scores and Sports Betting Odds hub](https://sportsdata.usatoday.com/football/nfl/scores) for a full list. Lines last updated Friday at 8:22 p.m. ET. All games ET unless noted. Texans RB Devin Singletary UNDER 66.5 rushing yards (-110) - Host Browns, Saturday, 4:30 p.m. (NBC) After a strong beginning when he became a starter, Singletary's numbers have dropped off primarily due to a lack a opportunities. He has topped this number just twice in his last 7 games. The reason for his lack of elite rushing days is that he has had 13 carries or fewer in 5 of the last 7 games, including just 9 carries against the Browns in Week 16. In order to top this number, he may need more than 15 carries and that may not be possible against a tough Browns defense that will make Houston earn everything it gets. Bills QB Josh Allen SCORES A TOUCHDOWN (-105) - Host Steelers, Sunday, 1 p.m. (CBS) Allen has scored 15 rushing TDs in his last 15 games, including 8 in his last 6 games. With a considerable amount of snow expected, when the Bills get near the goal line, Allen will likely call his own number to close out drives. He does when the weather is fine. He's likely to do it more often when the footing is bad and he knows where he's going while defenders try to react. Chiefs RB Isiah Pacheco OVER 66.5 rushing yards (-115) - Host Dolphins, Saturday, 8:10 p.m. (Peacock) One thing that is true about cold weather games is that the passing game is impacted much more negatively than the run game. No matter how sideline personnel try to keep the balls warm, when it's near zero degrees with 25 mph winds, the balls become like bricks in less than a minute. Pacheco has been the most consistent part of the Chiefs offense in their playoff run and has rushed 15 or more times in 5 of his 6 six games. In his last home game, he has rushed 18 times for 130 yards. With his speed and strength, if Pacheco gets 15 carries, which is very likely, it will be extremely difficult for the depleted Dolphins defense to keep him below this number. Lions RB Jahmyr Gibbs UNDER 52.5 rushing yards (-120) - Host Rams, Sunday, 8:15 p.m. (NBC) This one is a tough number not to surpass given the Lions elite offensive line, but there are a couple of factors that are going to make this number a little too high to pass barring a 20-yard carry along the way. The first is that veteran RB David Montgomery is the conventional runner coach Dan Campbell counts on to close out games and set the tone offensively. With the Lions making a rare playoff appearance, it is much more likely that Campbell will lean on Montgomery as the primary back and Gibbs as a change-of-pace/receiving back. The other issue is that the Rams are likely to come out throwing and try to turn the game into a shootout. If that happens, Gibbs may get his share of yardage as a receiver, but he likely won't get the carries he will need to top a number he hasn't beat in his last 2 games. Cowboys WR CeeDee Lamb OVER 98.5 receiving yards (-115) - Host Packers, Sunday, 4:30 p.m. (FOX) If the Cowboys are ever going to excise their playoff demons, it is going to require QB Dak Prescott to play some of the best ball of his career. To do that, it will require a heavy dose of Lamb. The Cowboys were chasing down the Eagles all season and have been playing playoff-style football for the last month and they have counted on Lamb to be the centerpiece of the offense. In his last 3 games, Lamb has caught 32 passes and posted yardage days of 118, 227 and 98. He has made his case of being the most dominant receiver in the league and will be targeted early often against a young Packers defense that will likely be unable to hold him down. Play our free daily [Pick’em Challenge](https://dailyticket.usatoday.com/) and win! [Play now](https://dailyticket.usatoday.com/)! For more sports betting picks and tips, check out [SportsbookWire.com](https://sportsbookwire.usatoday.com/) and [BetFTW](https://ftw.usatoday.com/betftw). author: Larry Márquez
title: Estados Unidos se prepara para una ola ártica que traerá temperaturas bajo cero
text:
Estados Unidos se prepara para una ola ártica que traerá temperaturas bajo cero en gran parte del país, según el Servicio Meteorológico Nacional (NWS) de este país.
El Servicio Meteorológico detalló que, la nieve por efecto de lago podría acumular hasta 90 centímetros en el noroeste de Pensilvania y el oeste de Nueva York, así como el Medio Oeste hasta el sur de Texas y Florida.
La situación comenzará a desarrollarse esta semana, impulsada por un potente frente frío que avanza hacia la Costa Este, reseñaron medios locales.
A punto de congelación En ese sentido, el NWS, advirtió que la masa de aire frío que se desplaza desde el Ártico afectará a millones de personas durante los próximos días. El fenómeno traerá temperaturas inusualmente bajas, con registros que estarán por debajo del punto de congelación en la mayor parte del país.
Entre las áreas más afectadas se encuentran regiones del Medio Oeste, el noreste y el sureste, donde los termómetros descenderán significativamente, publicó ABC News .
La nieve por efecto de lago podría acumular hasta 90 centímetros en el noroeste de Pensilvania y el oeste de Nueva York, según el Servicio Meteorológico Nacional. (REUTERS/Amanda Sabga) El miércoles por la mañana, las temperaturas comenzaron a caer drásticamente en el Medio Oeste, donde los vientos helados llevaron los índices de sensación térmica a mínimos extremos. En Dakota del Norte, por ejemplo, se registraron temperaturas de hasta -38°C debido al efecto combinado del aire frío y los fuertes vientos.
Efecto de lago en los Grandes Lagos El paso del aire frío sobre las aguas aún no congeladas de los Grandes Lagos está generando un fenómeno meteorológico conocido como nieve por efecto de lago, que podría provocar acumulaciones significativas en algunas zonas. Según las proyecciones del NWS, se han emitido advertencias de nieve por efecto de lago para partes del noroeste de Pensilvania y el oeste de Nueva York, donde podrían acumularse entre 60 y 90 centímetros de nieve localmente.
El episodio de frío extremo que afecta a Estados Unidos se enmarca dentro de los patrones típicos de variabilidad climática invernal en el hemisferio norte, sin embargo, el cambio climático global podría estar alterando la frecuencia y la intensidad de estos eventos, según diversos estudios científicos.

author: Folha Vitória
title: Cantores e instrumentistas se formam em projeto da MARANATA
text: Cantores e instrumentistas se formam em projeto da Maranata Membros da igreja participaram de formação e estão aptos a atuar no canto e com instrumentos musicais nos cultos da ICM Quase 300 voluntários da Igreja Cristã Maranata (ICM) de todas as idades se capacitaram em teoria musical, técnica vocal e instrumentos musicais por meio de um projeto voltado ao ensino da música. O Projeto Aprendiz é realizado em várias igrejas para formar instrumentistas e cantores, e na região da Serra, 283 alunos se formaram no dia 23 de dezembro, no Maanaim de Carapina, sendo 25 deles em canto/coral e o restante em instrumentos musicais. O ensino é todo baseado na coletânea de partitura da Igreja Cristã Maranata e cada vez mais membros têm buscado a formação para atuar nas igrejas. Neste ano, os instrumentos ensinados foram baixo, bateria, escaleta, flauta, violão, saxofone, teclado, trompete e violino. Também houve aulas de canto / coral, e os professores sempre se dispõem a transmitir o ensino voluntariamente. O coordenador do Projeto Aprendiz em Laranjeiras, na Serra, Deivis Sarmento, explica que há também o Projeto Aprendiz Júnior, direcionado para crianças e adolescentes. Além disso, todo o material do projeto é disponibilizado pelo Departamento de Louvor da ICM em meio digital. O material contém a letra digitada do hino, a cifra, a partitura e a gravação do áudio (voz e instrumento com um teclado e/ou violão). Periodicamente, são realizadas reuniões com os professores para avaliação do desenvolvimento dos alunos. “O louvor é a expressão da alma remida, o louvor é uma das formas de adoração a Deus. E quando adoramos a Deus, recebemos os benefícios através dessa adoração. O louvor salva, liberta e cura, pois a presença de Deus através do louvor muda a vida do homem”, diz Deivis. Fabiana Silva de Araújo, da ICM de Venda Nova do Imigrante, fez aulas de canto no Projeto Aprendiz e diz que o que a motivou a participar foi a possibilidade de ampliar seus conhecimentos e contribuir para a igreja onde congrega. “O projeto potencializou o meu apreço pela música. O curso foi muito bem organizado, os professores eram capacitados e dedicados se dispuseram a ensinar de forma voluntária. Agora, penso em me aperfeiçoar cada dia mais e atuar na minha igreja. A instrumentalidade e a fé andam juntas. Louvar o Senhor Deus é um alívio para a alma!” Confira o vídeo da formatura no Projeto Aprendiz: Gabriel Barcelos Cavalcante, de 12 anos e membro da ICM de Laranjeiras Central, formou-se em sax soprano pelo Projeto Aprendiz. “O que mais me motivou a participar do Projeto Aprendiz foi que eu via os instrumentistas da igreja tocando e, desde aquela época, virou um sonho meu tocar na igreja. O Projeto Aprendiz me abriu essa porta, e agora que eu aprendi eu pretendo tocar para glorificar meu Jesus Cristo pelo resto da vida.”

author: PA News Agency
title: Off-road drivers were swept away by river, says man who tried to save them | Ipswich Star
text: A man who tried to save three men trapped in a submerged 4×4 vehicle said they were “swept away” as they attempted to cross a river. Emergency services including police, ambulance and a helicopter attended a location on the River Esk near Glaisdale shortly before midday on Thursday. A 4×4 was recovered from the river by the fire service just after 3pm and three men found inside had died, North Yorkshire Police said. Chris Ford, who lives nearby, told the PA news agency the men were part of an off-roading group when they crossed a ford on Rake Lane. The river, swollen by heavy rain, swept them away and carried them around 400 yards downstream, he said. It came as Storm Gerrit caused flooding and travel chaos across the country throughout Wednesday and Thursday. Mr Ford, a firewood salesman, was called to the scene to help recover the vehicle with his tractor and found it fully submerged beneath the water, he said. He and two others used tractors to pull the 4×4 on to the riverbank, he said. Police said another man, who attempted to help those trapped in the car, was pulled from the river and needed medical treatment. Mr Ford told PA: “There was a ford they were going over and they were swept down 400 yards. “They were part of an off-road club. “I went down with my tractor. There was a couple of vehicles – one parked up. “You couldn’t see the (other) vehicle. It was 3ft beneath the water. “I helped get it out on to the riverbank with three other tractors.” Two other locals, Rosie and Andrew Dale, said they were with Mr Ford when he got the call to help. They said they saw several 4×4 vehicles pass their home in the direction of the ford shortly before the incident. Mrs Dale said “nobody local” would attempt to cross the ford in the current conditions. The area is popular with 4×4 drivers, she said, adding: “In the summer you get 10 of them at a time.” A spokesperson for North Yorkshire Police said: “Localised conditions across our area are making driving hazardous. “Roads are particularly badly affected around the River Esk, to the north of the county, as we have seen with the tragic incident near Glaisdale. “There was another incident at nearby Houlsyke at 12.49pm when a car got stuck in flood water and another at Kirby Wiske in Hambleton at 2.35pm. “Thankfully, the occupants of both vehicles were brought to safety. “The key advice is to consider whether your journey is necessary. “Please avoid driving through any kind of standing or moving flood water if you possibly can.” Witnesses to the incident at Glaisdale are urged to call North Yorkshire Police on 101, option 4, quoting reference NYP-28122023-0146.

author: Ivonne Semisky
title: Denunciaron a Juan Pablo Fioribello, el abogado de Fabiola Yañez por violación del secreto profesional | La 100
text: Juan Pablo Fioribello, el abogado de Fabiola Yáñez, fue denunciado por la figura de violación del secreto profesional, luego de revelar datos sobre los presuntos dichos de la ex pareja de Alberto Fernández en el marco de [ la demanda por violencia de género.](https://la100.cienradios.com/politica/se-filtro-la-estrategia-judicial-de-alberto-fernandez-tras-la-denuncia-por-violencia-de-genero-de-fabiola-yanez-evaluando/) “Fue una pesadilla”: un examigo de Fabiola Yáñez reveló escandalosos detalles de su relación con Alberto Fernández Juan Pablo Fioribello bajo la lupa por violación del secreto profesional en el caso de Fabiola Yáñez El abogado Jeremías Rodríguez fue quién presentó la denuncia contra su colega, Juan Pablo Fioribello por violar el secreto profesional y por asesorar en forma simultánea a personas que mantienen intereses opuestos, además de ventilar detalles de un expediente, que se mantiene en el marco de la confidencialidad. Es importante recordar que Fabiola Yañez denunció penalmente al expresidente Alberto Fernández por violencia de género ante el Juzgado en lo Criminal y Correccional Federal N° 10, que está a cargo del juez Julián Ercolini, pero sin la intervención de un abogado, por el momento, debido a que surge de lo hallado en el teléfono que se peritó por otra causa que involucra al exmandatario. Sobre qué ley se ampara la denuncia a Juan Pablo Fioribello, el abogado de Fabiola Yañez La denuncia contra Juan Pablo Fioribello que representaba a [Fabiola Yañez y al expresidente Alberto Fernández](https://la100.cienradios.com/politica/fabiola-yanez-hablo-con-el-fiscal-y-volvera-a-declarar-tras-su-denuncia-contra-alberto-fernandez/), se fundamenta en una acción prohibida por el Artículo 10 de la Ley 23.187, norma que regula el ejercicio de la abogacía en la Ciudad Autónoma de Buenos Aires, por lo que consideran que violó el secreto profesional al divulgar conversaciones privadas que tuvo con la presunta víctima. Acusan a Juan Pablo Fioribello, el abogado de Fabiola Yañez de violar el secreto profesional Esto ocurre porque, luego de que trascendiera la denuncia penal de Yáñez contra Fernández, el abogado comenzó a aparecer en distintos medios de comunicación contando detalles sensibles de lo que consta en la demanda por violencia de género. “Este deber es a su vez un derecho del cliente que garantiza la confidencialidad de que no se revele información obtenida durante la relación profesional con ellos”, afirmó Rodríguez, en la denuncia presentada.

author: french.xinhuanet.com
title: Le bilan porté à 166 morts en Tanzanie après les inondations et le cyclone Hidaya - Xinhua - french.news.cn
text:
DODOMA, 9 mai (Xinhua) -- Le bilan des inondations en Tanzanie, provoquées par les fortes précipitations et par le cyclone tropical Hidaya, a été porté à 166 morts, soit cinq nouveaux morts selon les chiffres présentés au Parlement jeudi par le Premier ministre Kassim Majaliwa.
Ce cyclone, qui a touché la côte tanzanienne sur l'océan Indien le 3 mai avant de s'affaiblir au cours de la journée suivante, a provoqué de fortes pluies et des vents violents qui ont blessé sept personnes, selon M. Majaliwa. La catastrophe a affecté 18 862 personnes, elle a détruit 678 maisons, en a endommagé 877 autres et en a submergé 543 autres encore.
S'exprimant devant le Parlement à Dodoma, la capitale du pays, le Premier ministre a indiqué que les fortes précipitations avaient ravagé les routes, les ponts, les poteaux électriques, les écoles et les dispensaires des régions de Lindi, Mtwara, de la Côte det de Morogoro, mettant à l'arrêt des activités économiques telles que la pêche, l'agriculture ou les entreprises.
Le gouvernement a mis en oeuvre des mesures de réponse, en collaboration avec les parties prenantes, telles que des missions de secours pour aider les personnes piégées par des inondations, la livraison de denrées humanitaires ou la rénovation d'infrastructures endommagées, selon M. Majaliwa. Fin
Vous avez une question, une remarque, des suggestions ? Contactez notre équipe de rédaction par e-mail à xinhuanet_french@news.cn

author: LISA O’DONNELL Staff Reporter
title: Stevie Wonder includes stop in Greensboro on 10-city tour
text: Everybody say “Yeah!” Stevie Wonder is coming to Greensboro next month. The legendary musician announced on Thursday a mini-tour that will include a stop at the Greensboro Coliseum on Oct. 17. Tickets go on sale Friday at noon through Ticketmaster. The concerts are being marketed as a call for joy, kindness and peace during a contentious election season. Titled “Sing Your Song! As We Fix Our Nation’s Broken Heart,” the 10-date tour will include performances in several swing states, including Pennsylvania, Michigan and Wisconsin as well as the concert in Greensboro. Wonder, 74, performed “Higher Ground” at the Democratic National Convention in August. A 25-time Grammy winner, Rock and Roll Hall of Fame inductee and one of the pillars of American popular music, Wonder has a few noteworthy connections with Winston-Salem. People are also reading… Clarence Paul, a Winston-Salem native, was among Wonder’s earliest mentors while working as an executive with Motown Records in Detroit. Paul co-wrote Wonder’s first big hit, “Fingertips (Parts I and II),” and produced much of his early work. Paul can be seen directing Wonder’s band in a performance of “Fingertips” on YouTube. Paul was born Clarence Pauling, eventually dropping the last three letters of his last name to avoid confusion with his brother, Lowman Pauling, who was the guitarist and main songwriter for the “5” Royales, a local R&B group that was inducted into the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame in 2015. In 1973, Wonder spent 15 days at Baptist Hospital recovering from a crash that nearly killed him. Wonder, then 23, was riding in a car on Interstate 85 near Salisbury when it crashed into the back of a logging truck. Well-wishers, including Paul McCartney, flooded the hospital’s switchboard, hoping to pass along messages to the injured Wonder. John Lennon and Yoko Ono sent flowers. Dr. Courtland Davis performed life-saving surgery on Wonder, who was at the peak of his career, having just released his masterpiece, “Innervisions,” days before the wreck. In an interview in 1974 after a concert in Greensboro, Wonder said he “was very, very close to death — even closer than anybody knew about.” Wonder was back on the road in five months. In ensuing concert stops in the state, he frequently mentioned the care he received while at Baptist, and even sent a card to Davis when he turned 60. 336-727-7420 @lisaodonnellWSJ

author: Tudocelular.com
title: One UI 7.0 beta pode ter lançamento problemático com muitos bugs, diz rumor
text:
Samsung 14 Nov
15 de novembro de 2024 [24 ](#comments)
Segundo rumores, a Samsung adiou o lançamento da beta da One UI 7.0 diversas vezes, mas a sul-coreana promete iniciar o período de testes antes do final do ano e o firmware estável no início de 2025.
[Após o programa beta público da One UI 7.0 surgir em aplicativo da Samsung](https://www.tudocelular.com/seguranca/noticias/n228001/samsung-beta-oneui70-previsao-lancamento-rumor.html), um novo rumor sugere que o estado da versão de testes da interface é problemático devido ao alto número de bugs.
Em uma postagem no seu perfil do X (ou Twitter, se preferir), o informante Ice Universe alega que a versão beta da One UI 7.0 está repleta de bugs, o que pode tornar o seu lançamento problemático.
Segundo ele, a versão beta mais recente com firmware terminado em XKB possui bugs e problemas relacionado a animações. Ice Universe diz que alguns erros não foram identificados em firmwares anteriores e surgiram no mais recente da One UI 7.0.
One UI 7 Beta may not be launched smoothly, and there are too many bugs. Even in the latest version of XKB, there are still bugs in animation, and they are new bugs.
— ICE UNIVERSE (@UniverseIce)
There are too many things that Samsung has fallen behind in recent years. It is very difficult for them to make up…[November 15, 2024]
O informante diz que a Samsung está atrás de outras marcas no aspecto de software, então precisa de mais tempo para consertar esses problemas da interface. Recentemente, um rumor sugeriu que a sul-coreana lançaria a beta da One UI 7.0 em 17 de novembro.
Entretanto, essa informação não veio de uma fonte oficial e deve ser encarada com desconfiança. A linha [Galaxy S24](/Samsung/fichas-tecnicas/n9105/Samsung-Galaxy-S24.html) será a primeira da fila na beta da One UI 7.0, que deve ser disponibilizada na Coreia do Sul e Estados Unidos. Alguns dias depois, pode chegar a mais países, como Alemanha, China, Índia, Reino Unido e Polônia.
Nada de Black Fraude! Ferramenta do TudoCelular desvenda ofertas falsas
Microsoft destaca novos recursos na build 26100.1876 do Windows 11 24H2
PS5: Sony começará a vender consoles equipados com peças de reposição
Huawei Kirin 9010L: chipset inédito é encontrado em smartphone intermediário da chinesa
